ygData.subject: Re: Corpse relocation fee's
ygData.msgSnippet: I never ever charge for corpse location.  If the corpse is in a spot I really don t want to go to, I give them the location and let them find it on their own.
ygData.messageBody:
I never ever charge for corpse location. If the corpse is in a spot I
really don't want to go to, I give them the location and let them find
it on their own. I don't like people who charge for binding, but at
least that takes mana. The only cost to the bard for finding a corpse
is personal risk, which can be avoided usually.

Jyzan of Karana

Jason_Sanderson@... wrote:
>
> From: Jason_Sanderson@...
>
> Hail! Snow! Sleet!
>
> Ahem..
>
> I was wondering if anyone else has set a standard for corpse relocations.
> I usually charge 5 GP minimum for up to level 5, plus 1 GP/2 levels rounded
> up. This is standard, plus I usually ask for tips or danger pay. Does
> this sound like too little? Maybe it should be 1 PP/2 levels after level
> 10?
>
> Cheers
> Reed in S. Ro
> a greedy bard...
